author: Doreen Christensen
title: Free 'Paranormal Activity' movie download with AMC Theatres ticket purchase
text:
Free 'Paranormal Activity' movie download with AMC Theatres ticket purchase Trailer: Paranormal Activity: The Ghost Dimension 
The Ghost Dimension centers on the Fleeges — father Ryan, mother Emily and their young daughter Leila — who move into a house and discover a video camera and a box of tapes. When they look through the camera’s lens, they begin to see the paranormal activity happening around them – including the re-emergence of young Kristi and Katie. In theaters October 
The Ghost Dimension centers on the Fleeges — father Ryan, mother Emily and their young daughter Leila — who move into a house and discover a video camera and a box of tapes. When they look through the camera’s lens, they begin to see the paranormal activity happening around them – including the re-emergence of young Kristi and Katie. In theaters October Get a free $7.99 movie download with AMC ticket purchase to "Paranormal Activity 5," out Friday. 
Get a free $7.99 “Paranormal Activity” movie download with purchase of a ticket at AMC Theatres. 
Purchase an advance ticket to see “Paranormal Activity: The Ghost Dimension,” at participating theaters and get a code for an HD download of one of five super-scary movies on ParamountMovies.com . Choose from "Paranormal Activity" 1-4 or "Paranormal Activity: The Marked Ones." 
The final film in the franchise, starring Chris Murray and Brit Shaw, at last reveals the hell-raising demon Toby. 
Click here for the deal. The offer ends on Thursday, Oct. 22.
